class.name: velodyne_pcl/Cloud2Nodelet
class.description: Aggregates points from multiple packets, publishing PointCloud2.

class.name: velodyne_pcl/RingColors
class.description: Assigns colors to the Velodyne laser rings for visualization.

class.name: velodyne_pcl/Transform2
class.description: Transforms packets into /odom frame, publishing multiple packets as PointCloud2.
